I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer.
i m always hungry.

content.text: Hi, I'm (participant_1). How are you doing today?
Hi, I'm (participant_2). I'm doing well, thanks! How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a video game designer. I just graduated from college and I'm really enjoying my job.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it. I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I used to be a web designer.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a stay-at-home mom.
It's definitely not for everyone, but I love it. Do you have any kids?
No, not yet. My significant other and I are planning on getting married soon, but we're not sure when we want to have kids.
Congratulations! I'm sure it will be a beautiful wedding.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to play video games, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
That's great! I love to do all of those things too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! I'm glad we met.
